text:
Hi, sorry for not replying for a long time! 

Ahh that’s cool. Yeah I’m doing a degree there, I’m currently in my first year. Studying what they call ‘The Art of Visual Effects’! For our project at home, we are using Nuke to add, remove and rebuild the scene in a way that we want. It’s only a 4 week project so it’s really just to play around and get to grips with it, which is what I’ve been doing. I have a iMac at home which is pretty decent and can run what I need it to run fairly well and we’ve only been given trial licenses, which isn’t the best!
